Class.ClassComment:
CloseableIterator /** * Interface that provides semantics of a {@link Iterator} and {@link AutoCloseable} interfaces. This isuseful when you have data that must be iterated on and may hold resources in the underlying implementation that must be closed.

Some implementations may close resources automatically when the iterator is finished being iterated on however this is an implementation detail and all callers should call {@link AutoCloseable#close()} method to besure all resources are freed properly.

* @author wburns * @since 7.0 */
